title: Defensive Information Operations
description: An IO officer must protect a friendly unit's social media presence from being hijacked or spoofed by an adversary.

tasks.description: Audit the security settings of the unit's official social media accounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer identifies weak passwords and a lack of two-factor authentication.

tasks.description: Implement stronger security measures, including complex passwords and mandatory two-factor authentication.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer successfully hardens the security of the accounts.

tasks.description: Monitor for any unauthorized login attempts or spoofed accounts and report them for takedown.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer establishes a process for ongoing monitoring and defense of the accounts.
